name: Tapestry
body:
### Welcome to Tapestry's GitHub Page
Browser histories are just a list of links chronologically ordered.  If you ask me not very interesting or very memorable, and there lies the problem.  Who remembers a web page by it's url?  Tapestry sets out to change by grabbing interesting content defined by Facebook's Open Graph Standard, and other meta data on the page.  Some day Tapestry might grab microformat tags too for quick searching and look up.

Our twitter account
http://twitter.com/tapestried

Checkout the Chrome Browser Extension.
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/anokhfoobafomacdgnkgekbccniknmia
tagline: A Visual Browser History using Meta, OpenGraph, and Micro Formats.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
